body:
Java and C# do not allow shadowing of local variables. A local variable can
shadow a field though. If I remember correctly C and C++ have the same
rules as Go wrt variable shadowing.

You can use

go vet -shadow [-shadowstrict]

to see shadowed variables in Go files.

I must admit that shadowed variables have been the source of a few hard to
find bugs for me initially. After some practice this becomes less of an
issue.
